Name: lithium hexafluorophosphate production | lithium hexafluorophosphate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: This dataset includes the reaction of lithium fluoride, phosphorous pentachloride and hydrogen fluoride in an autoclave to lithium hexafluorophosphate and hydrogen chloride. Conversion factor for lithium  is 86.7%. The reaction temperatur is -78Â°C. Assumption: Cooling happens with a heat pump (coefficient of performance = 1.5). Neutralisation of hydrogen flouride and hydrogen chloride with potassium hydroxide. Phosphorous trifluoride is proxy for phosphorous pentafluoride for emission to air.
